sn36.19:4.1: Atha kho pañcakaṅgo thapati yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami;
sn36.19:4.2: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn36.19:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca:
sn36.19:4.4: “kati nu kho, bhante udāyi, vedanā vuttā bhagavatā”ti?
sn36.19:4.6: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.19:4.7: imā kho, thapati, tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
sn36.19:4.8: Evaṃ vutte, pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca:
sn36.19:4.9: “na kho, bhante udāyi, tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā.
sn36.19:4.12: Yāyaṃ, bhante, adukkhamasukhā vedanā, santasmiṃ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
sn36.19:5.1: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā udāyī pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ etadavoca:
sn36.19:5.2: “na kho, thapati, dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā.
sn36.19:5.4: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.19:5.6: Dutiyampi kho pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca:
sn36.19:5.7: “na kho, bhante udāyi, tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā.
sn36.19:5.10: Yāyaṃ, bhante, adukkhamasukhā vedanā, santasmiṃ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
sn36.19:6.1: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā udāyī pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ etadavoca:
sn36.19:6.2: “na kho, thapati, dve vedanā vuttā bhagavatā.
sn36.19:6.4: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.19:6.6: Tatiyampi kho pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca:
sn36.19:6.7: “na kho, bhante udāyi, tisso vedanā vuttā bhagavatā.
sn36.19:6.10: Yāyaṃ, bhante, adukkhamasukhā vedanā, santasmiṃ esā paṇīte sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
sn36.19:6.11: Neva sakkhi āyasmā udāyī pañcakaṅgaṃ thapatiṃ saññāpetuṃ, na panāsakkhi pañcakaṅgo thapati āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ saññāpetuṃ.
sn36.19:6.12: Assosi kho āyasmā ānando āyasmato udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhiṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ.
sn36.19:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn36.19:7.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando yāvatako āyasmato udāyissa pañcakaṅgena thapatinā saddhiṃ ahosi kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
sn36.19:8.1: “Santameva, ānanda, pariyāyaṃ pañcakaṅgo thapati udāyissa bhikkhuno nābbhanumodi;
sn36.19:8.2: santañca panānanda, pariyāyaṃ udāyī bhikkhu pañcakaṅgassa thapatino nābbhanumodi.
sn36.19:8.3: Dvepi mayā, ānanda, vedanā vuttā pariyāyena.
sn36.19:8.10: Evaṃ pariyāyadesito kho, ānanda, mayā dhammo.
sn36.19:8.11: Evaṃ pariyāyadesite kho, ānanda, mayā dhamme ye aññamaññassa subhāsitaṃ sulapitaṃ, na samanumaññissanti, na samanujānissanti, na samanumodissanti, tesaṃ etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ—
sn36.19:8.12: bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharissantīti.
sn36.19:8.13: Evaṃ pariyāyadesito kho, ānanda, mayā dhammo.
sn36.19:8.14: Evaṃ pariyāyadesite kho, ānanda, mayā dhamme ye aññamaññassa subhāsitaṃ sulapitaṃ samanumaññissanti samanujānissanti samanumodissanti, tesaṃ etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ—
sn36.19:8.15: samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṃ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharissantīti.
sn36.19:9.3: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā … pe …
sn36.19:9.4: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn36.19:9.6: Yaṃ kho, ānanda, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ—
sn36.19:9.12: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:10.1: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
sn36.19:10.2: Idhānanda, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:10.3: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:10.8: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:11.1: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
sn36.19:11.2: Idhānanda, bhikkhu, vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:11.3: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:11.8: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:12.1: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
sn36.19:12.2: Idhānanda, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno, sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti:
sn36.19:12.3: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:12.4: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:12.9: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:13.1: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
sn36.19:13.2: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:13.3: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:13.8: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:14.1: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
sn36.19:14.2: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā, paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā, nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā, ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:14.3: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:14.8: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:15.1: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
sn36.19:15.2: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma, ‘anantaṃ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:15.3: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:15.8: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:16.1: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
sn36.19:16.2: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma, ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:16.3: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:16.8: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:17.1: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
sn36.19:17.2: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:17.3: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:17.8: Atthānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:18.1: Katamañcānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca?
sn36.19:18.2: Idhānanda, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:18.3: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
sn36.19:19.1: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, ānanda, vijjati yaṃ aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ:
sn36.19:19.2: ‘saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samaṇo gotamo āha, tañca sukhasmiṃ paññapeti.
sn36.19:19.4: Evaṃvādino, ānanda, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evamassu vacanīyā:
sn36.19:19.5: ‘na kho, āvuso, bhagavā sukhaññeva vedanaṃ sandhāya sukhasmiṃ paññapeti.
sn36.19:19.6: Yattha yattha, āvuso, sukhaṃ upalabbhati, yahiṃ yahiṃ, taṃ taṃ tathāgato sukhasmiṃ paññapetī’”ti.
